pli-tv-bi-vb-pc33:1.7: Sp 2.941: Saññattibahulā; divasaṁ mahājanaṁ saññāpayamānāti attho. … Viññattīti hetūdāharaṇādīhi vividhehi nayehi ñāpanā veditabbā, na yācanā. “Saññattibahulā: the meaning is they are trying to persuade crowds of people during the day. … Viññatti: not to be understood as asking for things, but as making known by various methods consisting of reasons, examples, etc.”
